name: Forced to Play 2
description:
You don't have to play the first game to understand this one since it's completely different.

This is a sequel to Forced to Play. To complete this haunted game you must beat all 16 very hard levels while defending of monsters, keeping track on your Heart rate and looking out for Power Outages.

Take the roll of a 15 year old kid named Charles Howland. His parents bought him a game from a garage sale that is "haunted". Upon starting up the game he began a curse that released some kind of spirits from the game into the real world. When they first appeared they were changing colors every second or so, until they stopped at Black and White. It's no coincidence that they stopped at those 2 colors. It actually represented Charles's personality. Very depressed and sad. They began to get closer and closer to Charles. He was scared and thought he was going to die. But he figured something out, by playing the game they will slow down and not attack as much. He thought that by completing the game they will go away. So that's what he did...

MINIMUM:
OS: Win XP, 7, 8, Vista, 10
Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9400 GT 1 GB
Storage: 200MB available space

RECOMMENDED:
OS: Win XP, 7, 8, Vista, 10
Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Graphics: GeForce 9600 GT 2 GB
Storage: 200MB available space

Voice Actors:
VAIN - Charles Howland
RedDawn Boulder - Kidnapper

Music:
Myuu - Main menu, credits
Eric Skiff - 8-bit music

Playtesters:
Boss4Domi
CyberStar
